sourcesContent:
import React, {useCallback} from 'react' import {RecordCardWrapper} from '../atoms' import {Col, Row} from 'antd' import {Title} from '../../../UIComponents/Typography/Title' import {Text} from '../../../UIComponents/Typography/Text' import {Avatar} from '../../../UIComponents/Avatar' import {RecordsTimeSvg, TimerSvg} from '../../../Icons/Time' import {EventSvg} from '../../../Icons/Event' import {ShieldDoneSvg} from '../../../Icons/Shield' import {StarSvg} from '../../../Icons/Start' import {SchoolSvg} from '../../../Icons/School' import {OfficialSvg} from '../../../Icons/Official' import {MilitaryTechSvg} from '../../../Icons/MilitaryTech' import {useTranslation} from 'react-i18next' import {QuickResponseCodeSvg} from '../../../Icons/QRCode' const cardIconArr = [ { name: 'pending', icon: TimerSvg }, { name: 'finished', icon: ShieldDoneSvg }, { name: 'approved', icon: StarSvg }, { name: 'awaiting', icon: SchoolSvg }, { name: 'canceled', icon: OfficialSvg }, { name: 'unregistered', icon: MilitaryTechSvg } ] export const RecordCard = ({name, category, srs, status, meet, date}) => { const {t} = useTranslation() const generateStatus = useCallback((statuses) => { switch (statuses) { case -1: return
{t('canceled')}
case 0: return
{t('awaiting')}
case 1: return
{t('approved')}
case 2: return
{t('scanned')}
case 5: return
{t('finished')}
default: return null } }, [t]) return ( {name} {category} {meet} {date} {generateStatus(status)} ) }
